Name: Slow Comfortable Mexican Screw Against the Wall
Ingredients: 15 ml Southern/Louisiana-style whisky liqueur (e.g. Southern Comfort)
Instructions: STIR first four ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. FLOAT sloe gin on surface so it bleeds into drink. Finish with Galliano FLOAT.
Review: Tequila adds a Mexican touch to a Slow Comfortable Screw . Great for a lazy summer afternoon or a barbecue.
History: Origins and evolution of the "Slow Screw" family of cocktails .
Nutrition: One serving of Slow Comfortable Mexican Screw Against the Wall contains 265 calories
